EmailTemplate.subject: NINE days until the mayoral election - have YOUR say!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HAVE YOUR SAY IN THE 2016 MAYORAL ELECTIONS!
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Do you know who you're voting for to be our Mayor of London?
There are only nine days left until the London mayoral elections! Have you made your mind up?
If you haven't made your mind up, or want more information, Bite the Ballot have made a great way for you to get involved and help you figure out who you want to vote for!
Play Verto London today and find out who you want to vote for!
Verto Play is a fun and easy way to educate yourself on the candidates and their policies
Empower your network today!
Ola Awosika
Graduate Programme Associate Manager - South West London
